title: AlphaChicken: Adversarial Game AI
description: A high-performance partial-information game AI ranked 1st out of 104 teams in a competitive AI tournament for multiple days. Uses bitboards, optimized search routines, and a dynamic evaluation function incorporating Voronoi territory and Bayesian risk modeling.

title: FastSSSP
description: Implementation of the paper "Breaking the Sorting Barrier for Directed Single-Source Shortest Paths." Engineered specialized data structures to bridge theoretical abstractions and practical performance, analyzing gaps between asymptotic and empirical results.

title: FastKnapsack
description: A unified C++ pipeline synthesizing algorithms from multiple theoretical papers for knapsack and coin change problems. Designed new randomization techniques achieving significant practical speedups over baseline implementations.

title: Mathpix: Handwritten Equation Solver
description: A hackathon-winning pipeline that converts handwritten math expressions into symbolic form and solves them using integrated APIs. Combines image processing, language models, and computational algebra systems.

title: ICPC-0: Competitive Programming Solutions
description: A repository of high-level competitive programming solutions, featuring advanced graph algorithms, dynamic programming optimizations, combinatorics, number theory, and constructive techniques. Emphasis on efficient C++ implementations and contest-grade problem solving.
